name: UpdateTeamMemberRole
description:
Update a team member's role in an enterprise team.

This tool updates the role of a specified team member within an enterprise team. It is intended for use by Company Admins on the Miro Enterprise plan. Ensure you have the required scope 'organizations:teams:write' to utilize this endpoint.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team whose member's role is to be updated.

parameters.name: team_member_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team member whose role is to be updated.

value_schema.description: The id of the Team Member

parameters.name: team_member_role
parameters.description: Role of the team member. Options: 'member', 'admin', 'team_guest'. Specifies permissions within the team.

value_schema.description:
Role of the team member.
* "member":     Team member with full member permissions.
* "admin":      Admin of a team. Team member with permission to manage team.
* "team_guest": Team-guest user, user with access only to a team without access to organization.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: The id of the Team Member

value_schema.description: The id of the Team Member

parameters.name: role
parameters.description:
Role of the team member.
* "member":     Team member with full member permissions.
* "admin":      Admin of a team. Team member with permission to manage team.
* "team_guest": Team-guest user, user with access only to a team without access to organization.

value_schema.description:
Role of the team member.
* "member":     Team member with full member permissions.
* "admin":      Admin of a team. Team member with permission to manage team.
* "team_guest": Team-guest user, user with access only to a team without access to organization.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
